channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: BLOCKING PAVEMENT: Brown bin & recycle bag removal, 3rd July
item.description:
Brown bin and recylcle bag full of very heavy materials outside 126 Asylum Road and blocking pavement - dangerous and unhelpful for both prams and wheelchair users. There is consistently bins either on the pavement or in the street in front of this derelict property. The new owners have planning permission out for works and real concern that care is not even being taken in the current state.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 126, Asylum Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
